action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: Paris
TO: Moscow
BY: Rented Car
CLASS: The most comfortable
WHEN: Next month, first week

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Have you already mentioned the origin of your trip to the travel agent? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No, I have not mentioned the origin of my trip to the travel agent yet.

ANSWER: No.

ME: Great, thank you. Now, what will be the destination of your trip?

ANSWER: The destination of my trip will be Moscow.

ME: And how do you plan to travel from Paris to Moscow?

ASIDE: The travel agent has asked how I plan to travel from Paris to Moscow.
no
Answer for FROM valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Has the travel agent been informed about your destination? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No, I have not informed the travel agent yet.

ASIDE: I will provide the travel agent with the following information: I want to travel from Paris to Moscow, next month in the first week. I would like to travel by a rented car in the most comfortable class.
